name: Platypus Finance
public_notice: 17 Feb 2023 : Platypus Finance suffered a flash-loan attack, kindly refer to this post for more details.

description.en: Platypus' AMM facilitates seamless exchange between pegged assets. Its single-sided liquidity provision redefines the way AMM works.
